metadata.title: CVE-2021-44507 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to the YottaDB code base). A lack of parameter validation in calls to memcpy in str_tok in sr_unix/ztimeoutroutines.c allows attackers to attempt to read from a NULL pointer.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
